hero.title: Code the Future with Artificial Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Gain the most up-to-date AI skills with Kodleon, Turkey's leading artificial intelligence education platform, discover your potential, and shape future technologies.

topics.title: AI Education Topics
topics.subtitle: Specialize in a wide range from machine learning to deep learning, from natural language processing to computer vision.

machineLearning.title: Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: Discover how algorithms learn from data and make predictions.

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing
nlp.description: Learn how machines understand, process, and generate human language.

computerVision.title: Computer Vision
computerVision.description: Understand how computers perceive and interpret images.

generativeAi.title: Generative AI
generativeAi.description: Explore AI models that can generate text, images, and audio.

neuralNetworks.title: Neural Networks
neuralNetworks.description: Learn about artificial neural networks inspired by the human brain.

aiEthics.title: AI Ethics
aiEthics.description: Discuss the ethical use of artificial intelligence and its societal impacts.

blog.title: Latest from the Blog
blog.subtitle: Discover the latest trends, in-depth analyses, and expert opinions in the world of artificial intelligence on our blog.

embodiedAi.title: Beyond the Screen: How Embodied AI is Learning to Understand and Shape Our World
embodiedAi.snippet: For decades, Artificial Intelligence has largely existed behind our screens, mastering complex calculations, generating insightful text, and creating stunning visuals. But a new frontier is emerging: AI that can perceive, understand, and interact with the physical world around us.

aiCodeAssistants.title: The AI Code Assistant Arena: Cursor vs. Windsurf (Codeium) and Others
aiCodeAssistants.snippet: The world of software development is rapidly transforming with artificial intelligence. One of the most significant players in this transformation is AI code assistants. So, which tool is right for you? Let's take a closer look at the popular options.

aiVideoGeneration.title: Animated Dreams with AI: A New Era in Video Generation with Veo and Flow
aiVideoGeneration.snippet: Next-generation AI models like Google's Veo and Meta's Flow are pushing the boundaries of creativity by generating impressive videos and animations from text and images. How do these technologies work, and what awaits us in the future?

whyKodleon.title: Why AI with Kodleon?
whyKodleon.subtitle: Kodleon is designed to provide you with the best experience on your AI learning journey.

expertInstructors.title: Expert Instructor Staff
expertInstructors.description: Learn the most up-to-date information from industry-experienced, expert instructors.

comprehensiveContent.title: Comprehensive and Current Content
comprehensiveContent.description: Continuously updated courses covering a wide range from AI fundamentals to advanced topics.

handsOnProjects.title: Hands-On Projects and Real-World Scenarios
handsOnProjects.description: Work on projects that allow you to apply theoretical knowledge to practice and strengthen your portfolio.

activeCommunity.title: Active Community Support
activeCommunity.description: You are not alone on your learning journey! Interact with other students and instructors.

turkishResources.title: Fully Turkish Resources

flexibleLearning.title: Flexible Learning Model
